text: CEPT may refer to: * CEPT University (Centre for Environmental Planning and Technology University), an academic institution located in Ahmedabad, India * European Conference of Postal and Telecommunications Administrations, coordinating body for European state telecommunications and postal organizations ** CEPT Recommendation T/CD 06-01, 1981 European Conference standard for display of videotex * Common Effective Preferential Tariff, an ASEAN tariff and trade scheme
title: CEPT
